name: Negroni
recipe: Mix gin, campari, sweet vermouth. Garnish with orange.

name: Old Fashioned
recipe: Mix bourbon, sugar, bitters. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Mojito
recipe: Mix rum, mint, lime juice, soda, and syrup. Garnish with lime.

name: Daiquiri
recipe: Mix rum, lime juice, syrup. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Bloody Mary
recipe: Mix vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, and spices. Garnish with celery.
